nodes.text: Sewing assistant droids were a type of droid with many arms, each specially designed for mending and sewing garments. The droids had a circular base and a tubular body covered in orange, black, and white plating where its arms were attached. Atop the body sat a domed head with a single black sensor.

In around 34 ABY, during the First Order occupation of the planet Batuu, the sewing assistant droid GX-8 was employed in Black Spire Outfitters in Black Spire Outpost on the Batuu. It aided the store's owner, Arta Kleidun, in keeping up with demand by mending clothing and completing other minor sewing tasks.

A sewing assistant droid first appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. Its look was inspired by a medical droid.
